sourceMeaningMnemonic: Aiming your <radical>gun</radical> out the <radical>window</radical>, you shoot at a <radical>tree</radical> filled with <kanji>ume</kanji>, <kanji>Japanese plum</kanji>s. This is, in your opinion, the best way to harvest the plums – shooting at them out your window with a gun.
meaningInfo: Imagine picking fruit off an ume tree in this way – shooting them off the branches with your gun. Picture yourself aiming at the fruits as you hear the gunshots ring in your ears and the smell of gunpowder fills the air.
readingMnemonic: You’ve probably heard of <kanji>ume</kanji> before, depending on your exposure to Japan, but an <reading>ume</reading> (<ja>うめ</ja>) is a <kanji>Japanese plum</kanji>.
readingInfo: Imagine eating your harvest of ume. Taste the ripe fruity flesh of these Japanese plums as you stuff your gluttonous face.
